Welcome to Landmark Mafia!
Mini Normal 1866


Moderated by BigYoshiFan

Back-up Moderator: Ircher

Reviewed by: Empking, mykonian, and mhsmith0!

Thank you for joining me in my first moderated game and thanks to my reviewers and backup moderator! We're gonna have lots of fun!

    Who is still alive?
    Spoiler:

    Who has died?
    Spoiler:

    2. PantherPunt, Town Motion Detector, was killed Night 5
    1. mlmooney89, Town Odd-Night Role Cop, was lynched Day 6
    3. Srceenplay, Vanilla Townie, endgamed Day 6

Rules

General Rules
  1. Follow all site rules
  2. Play to win, and be nice!
  3. I do not mind swearing, but personal attacks are NOT tolerated!
  4. Post using only the Mafiascum default text and do not post encrypted, hidden, or very small text.
  5. Pink and blue faded text is my color, do not use it.
  6. Use proper etiquette, please. (Spoiler tabs for long posts, L-1 Warnings, etc.)
  7. No "Bah!" posts once you die.
  8. DO NOT quote anything from private threads or messages.
  9. DO NOT edit any of your posts.
  10. DO NOT extensively use capital letters.
  11. DO NOT talk about this game on any thread but here, and DO NOT talk about ongoing games on here.

Voting and Deadlines
  1. Days are 2 weeks long. Nights are 2 days long.
  2. Extensions can be given at my discretion depending on the situation.
  3. Use vote tags for voting. Bold is okay, but vote tags are preferred.
  4. A lynch occurs when a majority is reached. (over 50% of all votes) If no majority has been reached by the deadline, no lynch will occur.
  5. A No Lynch and Draw votes are acceptable. A No Lynch requires a majority vote; A Draw requires an agreement of all living players via PM and PM ONLY. Do not abuse the Draw vote.
  6. Once a majority is reached, everyone may continue to talk, but no votes can be changed. This phase of the game is often referred to as the twilight phase.
  7. If there exists any ambiguity over who you wanted to vote or what action you wanted to perform, it will not count.
  8. If you do not submit a night action before the deadline, you will take no action.

Prods and Replacements
  1. Prods will be given after 48 hours of inactivity.
  2. Replacements will be searched for 24 hours after you have received a prod and not responded.
  3. If you anticipate to be V/LA for over 48 hours, let me know via chat or PM.
  4. When you have received your 4th prod, you will be replaced.

Miscellaneous
  1. If you notice an error made by me, any error at all, please let me know ASAP! I won't take it offensively, promise.
  2. If you have something directed towards me in thread, use the vote tag or bold and include @Mod or @Yoshi in the text.
  3. If you are unsure about anything, whether it be something you can post or clarification about the rules or your role, PM me. I won't bite!
  4. As a moderator, my word is final.
  5. I reserve the right to add or change these rules whenever needed. If this happens you will all be notified.

Game-Specific Rules
  1. A member of a mafia faction cannot perform an ability and kill at the same time.


Vanilla Townie Role PM Sample:
Spoiler:
Welcome ______ to Mini Normal 1866!

You are a Vanilla Townie

Abilities:
You have your vote and your voice, use them wisely.

Win Conditions:
You win once all threats to the town have been eliminated and at least one townie is alive.

Make sure you have read all the rules. Good luck and have fun!

All Role PM's have been handed out! The game will begin when 11/13 have confirmed.

Currently: 11/13 have confirmed

The game will start momentarily!

Welcome, players! You're going to embark on a journey around the world, visiting the most fascinating, awing sights the world has to offer. However, not everyone will live to see them all. For those who die, we'll honor those by burying/releasing them in the landmark of their choice.

Good luck and have fun!
